name: Call of Friendship
text: You target one nonhostile natural humanoid creature that is at least 2 levels lower than you. The target must remain within 10 squares of you and hear the entire performance. Once you complete the ritual, make a Diplomacy check to determine the effect it has on the target. Once the ritual’s duration expires, the target’s attitude returns to normal. The ritual does not affect the target’s memory in any way.
flavorText: Your song calls to a person’s heart, filling it with feelings of kinship, affection, and perhaps even love.
componentCost: 50 gp, plus a focus worth 50 gp

rows: The target acts as a friend for 1 hour, assisting you as he can, but he takes no actions that put him at any risk or that require an expense of more than 5 gp.
The target acts as a friend for 1 hour, assisting you as he can, but he takes no actions that put him at any risk or that require an expense of more than 25 gp.
The target acts as a friend for 6 hours, assisting you as he can, but he takes no actions that put him at any risk or that require an expense of more than 50 gp.
The target acts as a friend for 1 day, assisting you as he can, but he takes no actions that put him at any risk or that require an expense of more than 500 gp.
